verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
You are seated on the throne
The lion and the lamb
Odobu Ogagu eh
There is none like you

verse.lines:
You are seated on the throne
The lion and the lamb
Odobu Ogagu eh

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
My God, You reign
Yes, you reign
Jesus , you reign
Yes you reign

verse.name: v8
verse.lines:
Yeshua Hamashiach (The anointed one)

verse.name: v10
verse.lines:
As you are sitted
I am sitted
In heavenly places
Above all
Principalities and powers
